title: Cambiare
description: Everyone knows the fae are dangerous. Beautiful, capricious creatures, they are as enticing as they are forbidden.When Princess Cirelle’s brother falls deathly ill, there’s only one sure way to save a secret bargain with one of the fae folk. The cost? A year of servitude in the mystical faerie realm.Tangled in the glittering and blood-soaked faerie realm, the hedonistic Unseelie Court kindles something new—something dark and delicious—within Cirelle, even as it twists her new faerie master Ellian ever more inhuman. Can Cirelle unravel Ellian’s mysteries and survive long enough to return home before she succumbs to the decadent depravity of the fae?
author: Avery Ames
